review.title: “The best time in my life”
review.pros: Pros – All the managers are very helpful and friendly
review.cons: Cons – Nothing bad to say about the company.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Awful”
review.pros: Pros – If you love being in a crazy environment and want a start to your career, then you probably will like being here. Lots to learn every day.
review.cons: Cons – Pathetic management. Insane work hours from time to time. Extremely low pay.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get down on the floor and look at the reality rather than reading numbers at your desks.

review.title: “so so”
review.pros: Pros – They sponsor f-1 visa for international students. That is a good news for international students who seek jobs in the United States
review.cons: Cons – Poor management. No chance of going up.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Treat your employees better
